channel.title: How do i make my self admin on a 508?
channel.description: i try everytime go into the main save get my dude open and i see charecter rights but my pass is like : 372378128231798321 and its not rlly that i make the rights a 2 and change the pass to what i want it and it still dosnt work evey time i log on the info erases and i save it... whats wrong? thanks

item.title: How do i make my self admin on a 508?
item.dc:creator: @Ownage1310 Ownage1310
item.description:
@Ownage1310 wrote:

Open ur server.

Bulby->Io->Login open that in notepad then there search for something like

[sup]
if (p.username.equals(“YourNameHere”)) {
p.rights = 2;[/sup]

Then change the YourNameHere to you name and save+compile.

And your admin!

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my self admin on a 508?

item.title: How do i make my self admin on a 508?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

characters—>Mainsave---->Open Your Character File With WORDPAD! not notepad----->change rights to “2”----->log in to your account.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my self admin on a 508?

item.title: How do i make my self admin on a 508?
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

1st. Log off your account (dont shut server down)

2nd. Go in to your username.java

3rd. Go to the line that says “character-rights = 0”

4th. Change the “0” to a “2” on your part.

5th. Login, now your an Admin.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my self admin on a 508?

item.title: How do i make my self admin on a 508?

item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

thats called password encryption…
umm maybe you should stick with 317’s for now… 508’s aren’t really good for coding newbies
